code: import React from"react";import'../style/todoForm.sass';import todo from"../store/todo";import{observer}from"mobx-react-lite";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TodoForm=observer(function(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",onKeyDown:function onKeyDown(key){return todo.keyDown(key);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form__input",value:todo.inputValue,onChange:function onChange(e){return todo.handleChange(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form__button",onClick:function onClick(){return todo.addTask();},type:"",children:"add task"})]});});export default TodoForm;
